headline: Whish Money partners with Mastercard to enable remittances in Lebanon
summary: The tie-up enables Lebanese individuals to send funds to over 50 countries and receive money from abroad using Mastercard Move's solutions.

headline: Mastercard (MA): Assessing the Stock’s Valuation After a Steady Climb to Record Highs
summary: Mastercard (MA) has recently turned heads with its steady price advance, climbing nearly 6% over the past month and closing at $591.92. While there has not been a transformational announcement to spark this movement, the upward momentum is causing investors to ask whether the run reflects renewed growth prospects or shifting investor appetite for payment stocks in a changing interest rate landscape. This fresh climb comes on the heels of a strong year for Mastercard, with the stock returning...
